page.title: 14SCHOOL ACTIVITIES
page.content: On Friday 28th June class 4 went on a trip to P.G.L.In the morning we went canoeing .We went along the River wye. In the afternoon we did archery. We had to shoot crisps and an apple on the target (or try to).We also had a go on the assault course.On Tuesday 25th June the Lower Juniors went to a place in wales called St. Fagans it is a museam of old houses.The infants (class 1) went to the butterfly centre is Newent and afterwards they went to Queens Wood for a picnic. The rounders team took part in a rounders tournament on Monday 1st July. We played at Walford school.We played against Walford and Weston under Penyard.The District sports were held at Ashfield Park on Tuesday 18th June we took part in alot of things but we did especialy well in the relay. { By H. Read and H. White
